from tb_customer where phone=#{phone} and pwd=password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_customer
head_img = #{headImg.imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_customer set head_img = #{headImg.imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
